The claim is based on an attack ad relea: BornAliveTruth.org, criticizing Barack Obama's votes on abortion in the Illinois state legislature.
The ad features Gianna Jessen: a woman who survived a failed abortion, accusing Obama of opposing a law to protect babies left to die after failed abortions.
The ad refers to Illinois legislation pu: 2002, and 2003 that aimed to require doctors to provide immediate life-saving care to infants surviving intended abortions.
Barack Obama voted against the legislati: which has been a point of contention between supporters and opponents of abortion.
